Title: bitCount
Description: Calculates the number of bits set to one in the binary representation of a number.
x — Integer or floating-point number. The function uses the value representation in memory. It allows supporting floating-point numbers.
Number of bits set to one in the input number. UInt8.
NoteThe function does not convert the input value to a larger type (sign extension). So, for example, bitCount(toUInt8(-1)) = 8.
